product_name: Thule Pack 'n Pedal Rail Extender Kit
long_description: The Thule Pack'n Pedal Rail Extender Kit is an accessory for use with Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack (sold separately) to extend the pedal and foot clearance while pedaling with panniers. Easily attaches to Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack rails in order to slide Thule Pack 'n Pedal panniers further back on the bike. Creates more clearance for pedaling action if needed. Can be used on front- or rear-mounted Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack.
short_description: The Thule Pack'n Pedal Rail Extender Kit is an accessory for use with Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack (sold separately) to extend the pedal and foot clearance while pedaling with panniers.
